translations: n.控制，抑制；<美>路缘，马路牙子；（马的跗关节后部因扭伤韧带引起的）硬瘤

phrs.translation: n. 场外交易市场；股票证券场外交易市场

sentences.sentence: He needs to learn to curb his temper.
sentences.translation: 他得学着控制自己的脾气。

sentences.sentence: It's easier to pick up apples than to drag tree branches all the way to the curb.
sentences.translation: 摘苹果比把树枝一直拖到路边要容易得多。

sentences.sentence: If patients pay very little out of their own pockets, they have little desire to curb consumption.
sentences.translation: 如果病人自掏腰包支付的钱很少，他们就不会有遏制消费的意愿。
